name: Through Time and Space (vigneshkrishnan)
description:
A game where you blink through time and space to clear levels.

Controls:

Left and Right to move

Up and Left or Right to look up diagonally

Space to Jump

X to blink

Music Credits to:

remaxim

Lisboa

opengameart.org
